episodes.summary: Dive into the dawn of the “agentic era” as AI moves from answering questions to executing complex tasks, sparking high-stakes ethical standoffs between tech giants and the military. This episode also explores the real-world friction of driverless cars in residential neighborhoods, the latest shifts in the housing market, and surprising developments in national security and global diplomacy.
keyTopics: Anthropic Cowork and Salesforce Slackbot agentic AI tools
Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei refusal of Pentagon AI access
Google workers demand red lines on military AI use
Mistral and Accenture partnership for enterprise AI flexibility
Railway 100 million dollar Series B for AI infrastructure
Waymo driverless car residential staging friction in Orlando
US mortgage rates hit lowest level since September 2022
US military laser shootdown of Customs and Border drone
